My Blog

React

React is an open source Javascript library designed to create user interfaces to facilitate the development of single-page applications.

Openstack

OpenStack is a cloud computing project to provide infrastructure as a service. It is free and open source software distributed under the terms of the Apache license.

Git

GitHub is a forge for hosting projects using the Git version control system. It is mainly used for creating source code for computer programs.
